name: DRAW (solepilgrim)
description:
Send your desperadoes to victory using morse, a revolutionary and never-before seen game control technology! Plan, aim, and shoot, or run away as your plans go awry!
Play against friends in local multiplayer, or against a bot if you've got no-one else handy.
Music by Zitronsound @ bandcamp : https://zitronsound.bandcamp.com/track/wild-west
